insert into mkl_mail_info ( id, shipperName, shipper, shipTime, groupId, store, address, consignee, phone, predictTime, state, brand, createTime, materialContent, materialNumber, courierPhone, courierName, store_longitude, store_latitude, channel_code ) VALUES
( #{item.orderNumber}, #{item.shipperName}, #{item.shipperPhone}, #{item.shipTime}, #{item.shipperGroupId}, #{item.store_name}, #{item.store_address}, #{item.consigneeName}, #{item.consigneePhone}, #{item.predictTime}, #{item.state}, #{item.brand}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.materialName}, #{item.num}, #{item.courierPhone}, #{item.courierName}, #{item.store_longitude}, #{item.store_latitude}, #{item.store} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM mkl_mail_info WHERE id = #{0} AND isDelete = 0 GROUP BY id

SELECT A.myState, COUNT(A.id) AS con FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN state < 3 THEN '已发货' ELSE (case WHEN state >= 3 AND state < 6 THEN '派送中' ELSE (CASE WHEN state = 6 THEN '已送达' END) END) END AS 'myState', id FROM mkl_mail_info WHERE shipper = #{userPhone} and isDelete=0
AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(createTime) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(STR_TO_DATE(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'))
AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(createTime) < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), INTERVAL 1 day))
) A GROUP BY A.myState
SELECT m.id from mkl_material_info m WHERE 1=1 and m.delete_flag = '0' and m.material_name = #{material}
SELECT m.channel_code, m.store, m.state FROM mkl_mail_info m where 1=1 and m.serviceTime > #{startTime} and m.serviceTime < #{endTime} and m.isDelete = '0' GROUP BY m.channel_code
